Text.Value: *Your thoughts begin to fragment and buckle. With sinking clarity, you realise the Emperor was right - without it, you will die.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] *DUPE* PLYR Falls to their knees, gripping their head in pain. Idle. (If not Custom needed, can reuse GOB_Orpheus_VoiceOfAbsolute_OppresiveKneel)
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player falls to their knees, gripping their head in pain.

Text.Value: FOOL. Without all three stones, we have no hope of dominating the brain.
Now you hear me. Now you YIELD.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] *REUSE*  Existing NetherBrain anim (SCENE_INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus_BacktoHivemind?). PLYR & Emperor pain increases to a fever pitch. Idle.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Pain rises to unbearable pitch. We see a flash of the Netherbrain, looming over the player and the Emperor.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] *DUPE* PLYR in pain on floor. Idle
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player is kneeling, covering their ears, grimacing in pain. Voice of the Absolute booming in their head.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KB] Wind as player falls from the sky, , Ground impact is heard when screen goes black, , On "you are found" include sudden non-diegetic sfx hit to accentuate the 'jumpscare' and boomy-ness of the voice

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player mind flayer drifting into the Netherbrain's hivemind. (See: INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus in Empeorr's backstory for similar shot.) Game over.

Text.Value: *Your stomach drops, your chest constricts. Your thoughts begin to splinter.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player puts their hands to their heads as the Netherbrain forces its way into their mind.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] PLYR goes from hands over ears in pain state, to lifting off the ground . Can we *REUSE* SCENE_INT_EmperorRevealed_AftOrp_Half-IllithidTransform?
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player's body elevates off the ground, player in panic. It begins to break and crack (see: GLO_Tadpole_Consume animation for flavour). Player transforms into a mind flayer.
EditorData.SFXTags: Bones cracking, skin tairing and blood dripping

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player is thrown into void-space - a dark conceptual place.

Text.Value: I warned you. The brain is too powerful here - my protection is insufficient. You have ruined us. All of us.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: |Fade from black|

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] *REUSE* Construction CINE anim reactions for PLYR and Party.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The Astral Prism begins to shake and rumble - it's unable to retain its form as the Absolute's influence batters it.

Text.Value: Now you hear me. Now you YIELD.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] *DUPE* Pain increases to fever pitch, PLYR In agony, *REUSE* Netherbrain animation
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Pain rises to unbearable pitch. We see a flash of the Netherbrain, looming over the player.
EditorData.SFXTags: [KB] Surroundings get enveloped by black fog, , Creepy ambience(?), , Blood splatters from the player (from off-screen), , Elder brain voicing/sfx, Whoosh from the same black fog which envelopes everything else until screen is black

Text.Value: I thought you trusted me... I was wrong. And it will cost us everything.
I thought you trusted me... I was wrong. And it will cost us everything.
*Your heart sinks as you realise the Emperor is right. It's over.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [LOGAN] PLYR and Emperor LookAt eachother. Then grip at their heads and fall to their knees in agony. Idle. Could *REUSE* SCENE_GOB_Orpheus_OpressiveKneel.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player and Emperor look at each other for a beat - then both are overcome by the Absolute's influence (mindmeldy VFX) and fall to their knees.
Player and Emperor are both pulled into void-space.
Suddenly, a blinding rift opens up near the player. Light bursts out of it. White out.
The Emperor is dead on the ground.
Shot of player mind flayer drifting into the Netherbrain's hivemind. (See: INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus in Empeorr's backstory for similar shot.) Game over.
Shot of player mind flayer drifting into the Netherbrain's hivemind. (See: INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus in Empeorr's backstory for similar shot.) Game over. Emperor is present

Text.Value: Of all the ways I thought this might end...

Synopsis: The player has reached a dead end in their journey, resulting in them becoming a thrall of the Absolute. This directly leads to a game over screen.
